    Get image metadata in to_xml for generating xml
    
    The to_xml method of libvirt driver will generate xml file of instance
    during hard reboot/spawn/rescue/migrate and other operations, and the
    image_meta is used for generating correct xml of instance.
    But the accurate image_meta may not be passed into the get_guest_config,
    so some configs related to the image_meta will be lost, we need to get the
    image metadata if it is not passed to the to_xml method.
    
    Fixes bug 1206809
